 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָטַר‎</span>] **verb denominative** (compare [[BDB#Gerber|Gerber]]<sup>Verb. denom.106</sup>) [==rain==] (Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] Aph\`el <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַמְטַר‎</span>); — 

**Niph\`al** ***Imperfect*** ***be rained upon*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֶלְקָה אַחַתּ תִּמָּטֵר‎</span> [[Amos.4.7|Amos 4:7]]. **Hiph\`il** ***Pf .*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִמְטִיר‎</span> [[Gen.2.5|Gen 2:5]]; [[Gen.19.24|Gen 19:24]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְהִמְטַרְתִּ֫י‎</span> [[Amos.4.7|Amos 4:7]] ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַמְטֵר‎</span> [[Ps.11.6|Ps 11:6]]; [[Job.20.23|Job 20:23]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיַּמְטֵר‎</span> [[Exod.9.3|Exod 9:3]] + 2 t.; 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּמְטִיר‎</span> [[Amos.4.7|Amos 4:7]] (but read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַמְטִיר‎</span> [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#Vg|ᵑ9]] 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַמְטִיר‎</span> [[Amos.4.7|Amos 4:7]] + v[[Amos.4.7|Amos 4:7]] (for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּמְטִיר‎</span>), [[Ezek.38.22|Ezek 38:22]] ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַמְטִיר‎</span> [[Isa.5.6|Isa 5:6]]; [[Job.38.26|Job 38:26]] ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַמְטִיר‎</span> [[Gen.7.4|Gen 7:4]] + 2 t.; — ***send rain, rain*** (followed by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> except [[Exod.9.18|Exod 9:18]]; [[Exod.16.4|Exod 16:4]]); subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> (no direct object) [[Gen.2.5|Gen 2:5]]; [[Gen.7.4|Gen 7:4]] (both [[BDB#J|J]]), [[Amos.4.7|Amos 4:7]] (3 t. in verse), compare [[Job.38.26|Job 38:26]] subject clouds <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָבִים‎</span> by divine command [[Isa.5.6|Isa 5:6]] (accusative of congnate meaning with verb <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָטָר‎</span>); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָן‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִמִ‎</span> [[Ps.78.24|Ps 78:24]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁאֵר‎</span> v[[Ps.78.27|Ps 78:27]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֶחֶם‎</span> [[Exod.16.4|Exod 16:4]] ([[BDB#J|J]]; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִןהַֿשָּׁמַים‎</span> no <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span>); as act of judgment <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בָּרָד‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִמ‎</span> ***rain hail, send hail***, subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> [[Exod.9.23|Exod 9:23]] ([[BDB#J|J]]); compare v[[Exod.9.18|Exod 9:18]] ([[BDB#J|J]]; no <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span>); object <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎גָּפְרִית וָאֵשׁ‎</span> [[Gen.19.24|Gen 19:24]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), compare [[Ezek.38.22|Ezek 38:22]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְגֶשֶׁם שׁוֺטֵף וְאַבְנֵי אֶלְגָּבִישׁ אֵשׁ וְגָפְרִית אַמ‎</span>; figurative [[Ps.11.6|Ps 11:6]] (object <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פַּחִים‎</span>; but read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פַּחֲמֵי אֵשׁ‎</span> see [[BDB#Ew|Ew]] [[BDB#Che|Che]] [[BDB#Bae|Bae]] and others); [[Job.20.23|Job 20:23]] (\|\| clause <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְשַׁלַּח בּוֺ חֲרוֺן אַפּוֺ‎</span>).
